title: Can Bourbon Mix with Religion? | Lucas Hoge | Uncle Nearest
itunes:title: Can Bourbon Mix with Religion? | Lucas Hoge | Uncle Nearest
description:
Lost in an archive abyss, this episode was intended to be the first episode of The Fred Minnick Show. But it was lost. Well, Fred found the riveting conversation with country music star Lucas Hoge and it covers some intense territory, such as religion and bourbon, and Lucas' career. The conversation is so good that Fred will have to have him back; hopefully, the episode isn't lost next time.

Upcoming Blind Bourbon Shows

April 19, Green Bay, Wisconsin 

May 10, West Hollywood
